# registeredContentTypesForOpenInPlace

**Instance Property**

Registered content types that the system can load as open-in-place files.

## Declaration

```swift
var registeredContentTypesForOpenInPlace: [UTType] { get }
```

## Registering content types

- **registeredContentTypes**: Registered content types in the order the app registers each type.
- **registeredContentTypes(conformingTo:)**: Returns an array of registered content types that conform to a specified content type.
